ch.ethz.twimight
Class DisasterOperations

java.lang.Object
  Service
      ch.ethz.twimight.DisasterOperations

public class DisasterOperations
extends Service

Service for running the disaster mode. This is the meat of the disaster mode! Implementing the protocol for epidemice Tweet exchange.

Author:
pcarta
